control.name: Permanently delete unnecessary data
control.desc: Ensure that personal data is automatically deleted, within operational and back-up environments, whenever the defined retention periods have expired. This requires automatic identification of latest activities within the database (timestamping logging) and a data deletion functionality.

test.steps:
1. Verify personal data timestamp logging is in place indicating the time period in which the data was obtained from the user.
  2. Verify completion of automatic personal data deletion after mandated retention time-period has elapsed.
